snippet: Even the most passionate boating enthusiast looks for ways to cut expenses, which is hard to do while burning 100 gallons of fuel an hour.
abstract: Paul Sullivan Wealth Matters column explores tricks to saving money when dealing with the massive expense of owning a yacht; notes that yachts may be regaining value after a steep dip during the financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Even the most passionate boating enthusiast looks for ways to cut expenses, which is hard to do while burning 100 gallons of fuel an hour.

headline.print_headline: Indulging in a Yacht, but Still Minding the Expenses
headline.seo: How to Keep Yachting Expenses Manageable - Wealth Matters
headline.main: Indulging in a Yacht, but Still Minding the Expenses
